com.ericsson.oss.itpf.datalayer.dps.query.restriction.spi

Class SimpleRestriction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ericsson.oss.itpf.datalayer.dps.query.restriction.spi.SimpleRestriction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ericsson.oss.itpf.datalayer.dps.query.Restriction, DpsRestriction, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttributeRestriction, CdtMemberSimpleRestriction, InternalRestriction, ObjectFieldSimpleRestriction

    public abstract class SimpleRestriction
extends java.lang.Object
implements DpsRestriction, java.lang.Cloneable
    Creates a simple restriction (e.g. compare one field to one value).
    Since:
    1.2.3
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • negate

        public DpsRestriction negate()
        Description copied from interface: DpsRestriction
        Method that is inverting the given restriction

        E.g.: for a current equalTo restriction(=), this method will return a not equalTo restriction(<>).

        Specified by:
        negate in interface DpsRestriction
        Returns:
        newly created restriction that is a negation of the base restriction
